name: Дельта затраты продукта на ИТ план
expression: [Plan Cost of Works] + [Plan Transfer Cost of Works] + [Plan Subcontr CZ Exp] + [Plan Subcontr Exp] + [Plan Project Other Opex] + [Plan Travel Exp] + [Plan NZP Exp],
) - ( [Fact Cost of Works] + [Fact Transfer Cost of Works] + [Fact Subcontr CZ Exp] + [Fact Subcontr Exp] + [Fact Project Other Opex] + [Fact Travel Exp] + [Fact NZP Exp] )
